title: SAP security advisory – June 2025 monthly rollup (AV25-330)
description: On June 10, 2025, SAP published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following:
products: SAP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP  versions KERNEL 7.89, 7.93, 9.14 and 9.15
SAP GRC (AC Plugin)  versions GRCPINW V1100_700 and V1100_731
SAP Business Warehouse and SAP Plug-In Basis  versions PI_BASIS 2006_1_700, 701, 702, 731, 740, SAP_BW 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 756, 757, 758, 914 and 915
SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence (BI Workspace)  versions ENTERPRISE 430, 2025 and 2027
SAP NetWeaver Visual Composer  version VCBASE 7.50
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
